entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui MacCatalyst app can't be successfully submitted to Apple macOS store #12311
  • Building a NuGet package from .NET MAUI Class Library with Source Link results in the error described. #12309
  • CustomShellRenderer to change the color of navbar to a linear gradient #12307
  • build fails if xaml is in Platform/Windows folder #12306
  • MVVM: DataTrigger.Value Does Not Respond to Data Binding #12305

Closed

  • NotifyCanExecuteChanged event doesn't set correct button color on Windows #12222
    Backlog
  • Unable to upgrade from Xamarin Forms using migration assistant #12308
  • .NET MAUI Blazor Not Showing Blazor Views on iOS Simulator #12304
  • Button IsEnabled property in Windows Platform #7377
    Backlog
  • .Net MAUI clicked Button stays gray after enabling #12073

PullRequests

Created

  • Update image source after recycling bitmap in custom target #12310

Merged

  • Update Essentials Permissions API Docs #12252
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials MediaPicker API Docs #12245
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials OrientationSensor API Docs #12247
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Update Essentials PhoneDialer API Docs #12253
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Simplify hardcoded array of C# keywords in CodeBehindGenerator #12195
    community ✨
  • Update Essentials Screenshot API Docs #12269
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Preferences API Docs #12265
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add basic Android automated accessibility testing #11097
    area/testing
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12157
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
